QuestData.Title: In Defiance of Deathwing
QuestData.Description: It was in this place, ages ago, that Huln Highmountain challenged the great Deathwing.$b$bToday we shall re-live moments of that day through the eyes of our ancestors.$b$bFor this next part of the spirit journey, we must seek out the three braziers set down many ages ago so that those who would follow in the footsteps of Huln might witness his deeds.
QuestData.RewardText: And so it was that Huln Highmountain came to this mountain, freeing the drogbar slaves of Deathwing, and came into possession of the Hammer of Khaz'goroth.
